Interface Controller

public interface Controller
Decides what set of operations should be allowed or denied based on the caller's Module.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Checker
    checkerForCaller(Class<?> clazz)
    Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation.
    Checker
    checkerForCaller(Module module)
    Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation.
    default Checker
    checkerForCaller(Module module, String className)
    Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation.
    Checker
    checkerForTarget()
    Returns a Checker which is used to apply changes to classes which have deniable operations.

  • Method Details

    • checkerForCaller

      Checker checkerForCaller(Module module)
      Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation.
      Parameters:
      module - the caller's module
      Returns:
      a checker instance, which can be null if all operations are allowed

    • checkerForCaller

      default Checker checkerForCaller(Module module, String className)
      Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation. This variant is provided only for testing and debugging. A class name can be spoofed, and so it shouldn't be used to determine what Checker to return.
      Parameters:
      module - the caller's module, which can be named or unnamed
      className - the caller's class name, using '/' separators for packages
      Returns:
      a checker instance, which can be null if all operations are allowed

    • checkerForCaller

      default Checker checkerForCaller(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns a Checker which is used to determine if a calling module is allowed to perform an operation. This variant is provided only for testing and debugging. A class name can be spoofed, and so it shouldn't be used to determine what Checker to return.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the calling class, which can come from a named or unnamed module
      Returns:
      a checker instance, which can be null if all operations are allowed

    • checkerForTarget

      Checker checkerForTarget()
      Returns a Checker which is used to apply changes to classes which have deniable operations.
      Returns:
      a checker instance, which can be null if all operations are allowed
